title: Erzählungen
description: Erzählungen is the German term for tales. Here, Erzählungen is a collection of eleven not particularly short stories, from a cornucopia of today's most irresistible story-tellers. Macabre circumstances, unsettling characters, exotic locales, and often hilarious turns of the screw abound, in a buffet of coloratura tales.
author: Jason Castro
